item.title: Introducing: "Notebook"
item.description:
This past weekend I found drmaclver's post on starting a daily writing practice. I like the idea and I'm going to give it a try.

The content on this blog has never been all that polished, but I do expect these daily posts will be less consistent quality-wise. I'm fine â€¦
item.dc:creator: Ryan T. Harter
